body.content:
Dear Friend,

Thanks for your wonderful reply.  I am once again assuring you that
this transaction is 100% risk free because I am sure of what we are
about to engage upon, so you do not have to worry for anything because
I am here to be feeding you with all the necessary information the
bank may need from you as the Foreign Trustee/next of kin of their
deceased
customer.

I am a family man and well respected person over here, so my
reputation is very very important to me and for this reason i will
never partake in any illegal process in completing this
transaction,therefore you must be rest assured that we will follow
legal and official process to complete the transaction, so don’t worry
as your interest will be legally protected.

Once the claim is approved by my bank here, then my bank here will
issue you original Certified and verifiable documents to cover the
source of funds.

For you to know that I am 100% sure of this transaction, you will see
my passport, photo and my profiles, so with these details of mine, you
do not have to be afraid of anything ok.


Please always remember that this transaction is very confidential
between me and you. You do not have to expose this transaction to
anybody, be it who. Every successful person in this world has his or
her own secret of success so let this transaction be the secret of our
own success too.

Below are my profiles.


My full name: Mr. Steven Salif Zuma
Date of Birth:15/12/1965
Marital Status: Married with 3 children
City: Ouagadougou
Country of Origin: Burkina Faso.
Currently working with BCB (Banque Commerciale du Burkina) - Ouagadougou.

WORK EXPERIENCE

Accomplished Accountant With a lot of Years Of Experience In Finance
And Accounts


I would like to have your full information before we proceed. Once
again, You have to understand that we will go into contract agreement
before we can proceed with this transaction. Once I receive the
following information from you, I will send you the (M.O.U) memorandum
of understanding for you to go through first before signing it.


(1) your full name.
(2) Your occupation
(3) your marital status
(4) Your complete residential address.
(5) A copy of your photo scanned and sent by mail or with your driver's license.


Finally, you should note that this transaction is very confidential
between me and you alone so I advise you to keep it to yourself until
the funds hit your account.

I am waiting.

Best regards,
Mr. Steven Salif Zuma
